2017 Corporate Responsibility ReportAbout this Report
Thank you for your interest in our 2017 Corporate Responsibility Report, which reflects the operations of the American Airlines 
Group for the 2017 calendar year. In developing this report, we reference the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) Sustainability 
Reporting Standards as published in 2016. Disclosures corresponding to the GRI Standards can be found in our GRI Index.
